summary: A unit‑test suite that validates TensorFlow logits processors and warpers used to shape token probability distributions during text generation, covering forced token insertion, start/end token enforcement, length constraints, bad‑word filtering, n‑gram repetition avoidance, penalty application, token suppression, and sampling temperature/top‑k/top‑p strategies.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and controllable language model output by testing that each logits manipulation component behaves as expected, supporting safe and customizable text generation in production systems.
